reviewText: A good follow up to the first season. A lot of questions get answered and the plot moves forward nicely. I still have a few questions but maybe there will be a third instalment?
Second part of a good anime. The story was simple with a few twists and some characters were good. And finally an anime with an ending...

This is a great anime series. It will appeal to both he classic anime lover as well as to the newest generation of fans. If you like top notch animation, awesome robot action and a strong character driven plot, then this one is the perfect choice.
